38 /* utility definitions */
39 #define NC (CHAR_MAX - CHAR_MIN + 1)
40 typedef unsigned char uch;
41 
42 /* switch off assertions (if not already off) if no REDEBUG */
43 #ifndef REDEBUG
44 #ifndef NDEBUG
45 #define NDEBUG /* no assertions please */
46 #endif
47 #endif
48 #include <assert.h>
49 
50 /* for old systems with bcopy() but no memmove() */
51 #ifdef USEBCOPY
52 #define memmove(d, s, c) bcopy(s, d, c)
53 #endif
